snippet: A report criticizes the New York State Joint Commission on Public Ethics as lacking independence from the politicians it is supposed to oversee.
abstract: New York City Bar Association and private group Common Cause are expected to release a report that criticizes New York's Joint Commission on Public Ethics and calls on the panel to take major steps to shore up its image.
lead_paragraph: A report criticizes the New York State Joint Commission on Public Ethics as lacking independence from the politicians it is supposed to oversee.

headline.main: New York City Bar Association Urges Steps to Improve Ethics Panel
headline.print_headline: Steps Urged to Improve Ethics Panel
